description: Canopic Satchel - Auto-collecting artifact system with passive support effects

canopicSatchel.name: Canopic Satchel
canopicSatchel.description: Sacred vessel holding the organs of divine artifacts, automatically collecting fallen relics
canopicSatchel.lore: The Canopic Satchel, modeled after the sacred vessels that held the organs of the pharaohs, now serves to contain the divine artifacts that fall from defeated guardians of the underworld.

artifactTypes.name: Support Artifact
artifactTypes.description: Passive artifacts that enhance abilities and provide support effects

artifactTypes.name: Stat Artifact
artifactTypes.description: Pure stat-boosting artifacts from divine favor

artifactTemplates.name: Scale of Anubis
artifactTemplates.description: The scale used to weigh the hearts of the dead, now granting judgment in combat
artifactTemplates.lore: The very scale that determines worthiness in the afterlife now tips the balance in your favor.

artifactTemplates.name: Quill of Thoth
artifactTemplates.description: The quill that recorded all knowledge, now enhancing magical abilities
artifactTemplates.lore: The quill of wisdom multiplies your projectiles, each carrying ancient knowledge.

artifactTemplates.name: Eye of Horus
artifactTemplates.description: The protective eye that wards off evil, enhancing vision and precision
artifactTemplates.lore: The eye that sees all now ensures your strikes carry the weight of divine judgment.

artifactTemplates.name: Tear of Isis
artifactTemplates.description: A tear shed for Osiris, carrying restorative powers
artifactTemplates.lore: A single tear of the goddess, carrying the power to mend and restore life.

artifactTemplates.name: Fang of Set
artifactTemplates.description: Fang from the god of chaos, granting raw destructive power
artifactTemplates.lore: A fang from the god of storms and chaos, channeling destructive force through your weapons.

artifactTemplates.name: Claw of Bastet
artifactTemplates.description: Claw of the cat goddess, bringing fortune and increased loot
artifactTemplates.lore: The claw of fortune ensures treasures find their way to worthy adventurers.

artifactTemplates.name: Ray of Ra
artifactTemplates.description: A fragment of the sun god's eternal light, burning enemies
artifactTemplates.lore: A ray from the sun itself, carrying the burning justice of Ra to all who oppose you.

artifactTemplates.name: Tooth of Ammit
artifactTemplates.description: Tooth from the devourer of souls, stealing life from enemies
artifactTemplates.lore: A tooth from the great devourer, turning the life force of enemies into your own sustenance.

artifactTemplates.name: Shell of Khepri
artifactTemplates.description: Shell fragment carrying the power of eternal transformation
artifactTemplates.lore: A fragment of the scarab's eternal shell, carrying the momentum of perpetual rebirth.

artifactTemplates.name: Feather of Maat
artifactTemplates.description: Feather of truth and justice, ensuring perfect balance in combat
artifactTemplates.lore: The feather that tips the scales of justice, ensuring your strikes carry perfect balance.
